short_definition: One growing out of or auxiliary to another action or suit, or which is subordinate to or in aid of a primary action, either law or in chancery.
long_definition_html: One growing out of or auxiliary to another action or suit, or which is subordinate to or in aid of a primary action, either law or in chancery.
long_definition_markdown: One growing out of or auxiliary to another action or suit, or which is subordinate to or in aid of a primary action, either law or in chancery.
long_definition_text: One growing out of or auxiliary to another action or suit, or which is subordinate to or in aid of a primary action, either law or in chancery.
